rows.label: tlk45300021_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I moved my family here from
Superbia because I heard it was
a really safe place to live...

rows.label: tlk45300021_01_msg0002
rows.name:
A fight between those Iira
terrorists and Superbia's finest Blade
is exactly NOT what I signed up for!

rows.label: tlk45300021_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I just want my wife and daughter
to have a peaceful life, but at this
rate, it seems this isn't it...

rows.label: tlk45300021_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I hope all this gets sorted out sooner
rather than later. It feels like the
whole city's on edge.
